definition: to have one stomach's pumped/gastric lavage (medicine)

sentences.english: In this paper, the design of a safe and multifunctional gastric lavage machine is presented.
sentences.chinese: 介紹一種安全的多功能的洗胃機。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the influence of gastric lavage on blood rheology of patients with oral poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討洗胃對口服中毒患者血液流變學指標的影響。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effective remain length of nose and gastric tuber during small volume gastric lavage.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討小兒小容量洗胃時鼻胃管留置的有效長度。

sentences.english: If people eat natural poisons, they must go to the hospital right away to have their stomachs emptied.
sentences.chinese: 如果人們信用了天然毒物，他們必須馬上去醫院洗胃。

sentences.english: A case of stomach perforation during gastric lavage for chlordiazepoxide poisoning is reported.
sentences.chinese: 本文報告一例利眠寧中毒洗胃致胃穿孔的病例。

sentences.english: A new type of gastric washing machine driven by an electronic pump is introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 一種採用電子泵驅動的新型洗胃機。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo observe the effects of a low pressure aspirator applied to infantile gastric lavage.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解低壓吸引器進行小兒洗胃的臨牀效果。

sentences.english: Ask infirmly infirmly wash lavatory fluid to you can use gastric lavage ?
sentences.chinese: 弱弱問問洗廁液可以用來洗胃麼？

sentences.english: Treatment involves washing out the stomach and promptly administering the antidote dimercaprol.
sentences.chinese: 急性砷中毒的治療包括洗胃和及時服用二巰基丙醇。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the nursing methods of gastric lavage.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討洗胃技術的護理措施。

definition: intravenous infusion/to get put on an IV
to put sb on an intravenous drip
to put sb on an intravenous drip
to put sb on an intravenous drip
